objects.text:
Japanese Quartz Movement
Stainless Steel Construction
Waterproof Design 3ATM
Auto Date Function

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sleek and modern layout for promoting a luxury men's watch. The background features layered gradients with subtle curved shapes and fine borders, giving depth and sophistication. A prominent image of the watch is placed on the right side, supported by a product description neatly aligned to the left (`description`). The main heading (`heading`) uses a futuristic typeface in gold, paired with a clean bold subheading (`subheading`) in white. The price tag (`price`) is emphasized in large gold typography, directly above a gold call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with black text (`cta`). The design effectively balances luxury and clarity.

**Color Palette:**
- Gold: #C8AA64
- White: #FFFFFF
- Deep Black: #121212
- Charcoal Gray: #2A2A2A
- Soft Gray Border: #888888
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish, sleek black chronograph wristwatch with a metallic finish. The primary color palette features various shades of black, grey, and chrome, representing sophistication and elegance. The watch dial is a smooth gradient from gunmetal grey (#4A4A4A) to graphite black (#1C1C1C), blending seamlessly to highlight the minimalistic markers and sub-dials. Polished stainless steel luster (#B0B0B0) accents the sub-dials and edges, adding contrast. The bracelet's high-gloss finish in jet black (#0A0A0A) enhances the watch's premium appeal. For an advertisement banner, use this monochromatic palette with sharp, clean fonts and subtle lighting to emphasize luxury and precision.
